data.name: Cannibals
data.detailed_description:
After reports and the fact that a family of cannibals was operating in the local forestry, law enforcement agencies decided to clean up the territory. The coordinates of their location were known in advance from the testimony of Detective Richard Hoffman, who had been there a few days earlier and experienced the horror of the events that took place there ...
The police take a detective with them for quick orientation on the ground and arrive there to put an end to the bloody atrocities of the cannibals. But this is just the beginning...

In the game you will be presented with:
- Dark and chilling atmosphere
- Interesting, intricate plot
- Built-in mini-games
- Lots of screamers
- Unexpected endings (multivariance)
data.about_the_game:
After reports and the fact that a family of cannibals was operating in the local forestry, law enforcement agencies decided to clean up the territory. The coordinates of their location were known in advance from the testimony of Detective Richard Hoffman, who had been there a few days earlier and experienced the horror of the events that took place there ...

data.short_description: A family of cannibals is killing people in the local forestry. Together with the police, you are heading there to stop the bloody atrocities...
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space
